The movie stars Keanu Reeves, who is quite popular these days. If you enjoy complex character development and intriguing storylines, I think you'll find this one captivating!

Another option could be "Her" – a unique blend of drama, science fiction, and romance that explores the human experience in our increasingly digital world. Starring Scarlett Johansson, it's a poignant reflection on love, connection, and what it means to be alive in today's society. I believe you might find it interesting given your preference for LGBT-themed stories.

If you're intrigued by the spiritual aspect mentioned in your original request, I'd also like to suggest "Afterlife" (2011). This film features a father-son story that transcends life and death as a neurotic young man helps his ghost father cross to the otherworld. Robinne Lee doesn't appear in this film, but it could still be an interesting watch for you. Enjoy exploring these recommendations!
